name: In the Apocalypse with you
description:
Me and MilaX always used to do Roleplay (SFW obviously), it was pretty fun because we both always had a passion for it. But one-time MilaX suggested: "What if we turned one of our Roleplays into a complete RPG?" I thought that it was a pretty good idea, but once I sat down and try to learn how to use RPG Maker, I quickly learned it wasn't that easy. Then I remembered that we could just use Ren'Py to make a visual novel game about it. MilaX was fine with that. What's funny though is that the game used to just, be a small test for something different we planned. It was called: "hospital story test" or something. But we both put a lot of effort into it and it seemed really fun already, that i just decided to turn that "test" into an actual game. And that's when we actually started to consistently work on it.
